TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit LoginName extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

span.span: Displays the value of the property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 默认情况下，控件显示的名称中包含属性类。By default, the control displays the name contained in the property of the class. 如果`System.Web.UI.Page.User.Identity.Name`属性为空，则不呈现该控件。If the `System.Web.UI.Page.User.Identity.Name` property is empty, the control is not rendered. > [!NOTE] > 如果你不熟悉的 ASP.NET 提供的登录控件集，请参阅[ASP.NET 登录控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能继续。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 有关与登录控件和成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 若要更改显示的文本控制、 设置属性。To change the text displayed by the control, set the property. > [!NOTE] > 控件不能使用外部`
`标记在网页上。The control cannot be used outside the `` tag on a Web page. 具体而言，不能用于将用户的名称放在网页的标题。Specifically, the cannot be used to put the user's name in the title of a page. ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件，以使其生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用页面上的类。The following code example shows how to use the class on a page. 单击按钮将更改的显示格式。Clicking the button changes the display format. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/CS/loginnametextformatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/VB/loginnametextformatvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string FormatString
Public Overridable Property FormatString As String

summary.span: 提供要显示的格式项字符串。

span.span: Provides a format item string to display.

value.span: 包含用于显示用户名的格式项的字符串。

span.span: A string containing format items for displaying the user's name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含在网页上显示用户的名称的标准文本格式字符串。The property contains a standard text format string that displays the user's name on the Web page. 字符串"{0}"指示字符串中插入用户的名称的位置。The string "{0}" indicates where in the string the user's name is inserted. 下表描述可用的属性设置。The following table describes the available property settings. |属性设置Property setting|行为Behavior| |----------------------|--------------| |默认值 （"{0}")Default ("{0}")|当用户登录; 时，将显示用户的名称否则，不会显示。The user's name is displayed when the user is logged on; otherwise, nothing is displayed.| ||默认值相同。Same as default. 若要隐藏控件，设置属性`false`。To hide the control, set the property to `false`.| |"欢迎使用我的站点，{0}。""Welcome to my site, {0}."|显示字符串"欢迎使用我的站点，*用户名*。"Displays the string "Welcome to my site, *username*." 当用户登录。when the user is logged in. 用户未登录时, 不会显示。When the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| |"欢迎使用我的站点。""Welcome to my site."|当属性设置为一个字符串，当用户登录时，将显示字符串。When the property is set to a string, the string is displayed when the user is logged in. 由于字符串不包含"{0}"，将不会显示用户的名称。Because the string does not contain "{0}", the user's name is not displayed. 用户未登录时, 不会显示。When the user is not logged in, nothing is displayed.| 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用页面上的属性。The following code example shows how to use the property on a page. 单击按钮将更改的显示格式。Clicking the button changes the display format. [!code-aspx-csharp[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/CS/loginnametextformatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[LoginNameTextFormat#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/LoginNameTextFormat/VB/loginnametextformatvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The format string is not valid.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示 ASP.NET 应的呈现方式 HTML 控件时控件被禁用。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 呈现`disabled`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 呈现`class`属性时控件被禁用。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .
